guide.introduction: Have fun hacking,annoying and playing with this synthesizer you can build in just one weekend.
guide.introduction_rendered: Have fun hacking,annoying and playing with this synthesizer you can build in just one weekend.
guide.summary:
This synthesizer is a hackable circuit used in music construction. 
Published and built by Jordan Malan.
guide.title: 9 POT synthesizer
